Name: Stone Place
Ingredients: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: Rum loves fruit, and this rust-pink cocktail has plenty of it.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2010 by Willy Shine at Forty-Four in New York City, USA. This twist on the Ward 8 is named after the street where Shine's parents, who were big Ward 8 imbibers, used to live.
Nutrition: One serving of Stone Place contains 201 calories
